params._amountPoolSharesTokens: The amount of share tokens to burn.
params._minAmountOut: The minimum amount of principal tokens expected from the withdrawal.
params._recipient: The address to receive the withdrawn principal tokens.

params._bidId: The ID of the defaulted loan bid to liquidate.
params._tokenAmountDifference: The incentive amount required for liquidation.

params._amountPoolSharesTokens: The amount of share tokens to prepare for withdrawal.

burnSharesToWithdrawEarnings(address,add.notice: Allows the contract owner to burn shares and withdraw principal tokens from the specified LenderCommitmentGroup contract.

liquidateDefaultedLoanWithIncentive(addr.notice: Allows the contract owner to liquidate a defaulted loan with incentive in the specified LenderCommitmentGroup contract.

prepareSharesForWithdraw(address,uint256.notice: Allows the contract owner to prepare shares for withdrawal in the specified LenderCommitmentGroup contract.
